pull.title: guix: move bison from global scope, to Linux
pull.body: This is only needed for the Qt build (libxkbcommon), on Linux, so does not need to be built/present for the macOS or Windows builds.

verification.payload:
tree 550a8b8e8828e9043450941b357c511df1e3c8cc
parent 30cef53707fb62ab1c9e73c2b5bc8b006e0613d3
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1722010665 +0100
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1722010665 +0100

guix: move bison from global scope, to Linux

This is only needed for the Qt build, on Linux, so does not need to be
built/present for the macOS or Windows builds.

events.message:
guix: move bison from global scope, to Linux

This is only needed for the Qt build, on Linux, so does not need to be
built/present for the macOS or Windows builds.
